___addressLine2.description: The second address line for each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

___addressLine1.description: The first address line for each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

___regionCode.description: The region code of each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

___postalCode.description: The postal or ZIP code for each location. Can accept Zip + 4 or Zip. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

___city.description: The city of each location. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

___region.description: The region of each location. This is often the state or province. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with name.

___given.description: The given name (first name) of the individual. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with postal address.

___full.description: Full name of the contact (givenName, familyName). Only queryable when provided in conjunction with postal address.

___family.description: The family name (last name) of the individual. Only queryable when provided in conjunction with postal address.

___email.description: One email addresses of the contact. Can accept cleartext, an MD5 or SHA-256 hash representation of the email address to query. Be certain to lowercase and trim the email address prior to hashing. There is a limit of 10 hashed emails (Queryable)

___twitter.description: Twitter handle of the contact. Acceptable formats include handle (with or without "@"), as well as the URL to the profile. (Queryable)

___phones.description: One or many phone numbers of the contact. (Queryable)

___emails.description: One or many email addresses of the contact. Can accept cleartext, an MD5 or SHA-256 hash representation of the email address to query. Be certain to lowercase and trim the email address prior to hashing. (Queryable)

___profiles.description: URLs, IDs and usernames to the profiles on the social platform. (Queryable)

___url.description: URL to the profile on the social platform.

___userid.description: User ID associated with the profile.
